name: Sunita Chandrasekaran
content: CRPL -- Computational Research Programming Lab | About Dr. Sunita ChandrasekaranWelcome to my research group! I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer and Information Sciences at the University of Delaware.I direct the First State AI Institute at UD. I also serve as the Vice-Chair for the State of Delaware AI Commission (https://ai.delaware.gov/).For my recent NSF project on Democratizing Access to Research Software Engineering, please visit: https://sites.udel.edu/darse/.For a list of publications and a full copy of my CV, please click the PDF icon below.
